metadata.title: CVE-2019-8937 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HotelDruid 2.3.0 has XSS affecting the nsextt, cambia1, mese_fine, origine,and anno parameters in creaprezzi.php, tabella3.php, personalizza.php, andvisualizza_tabelle.php.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
